question: What is the theme of the ‘International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women’ 2020?
option1: Orange the World: Fund, Respond, Prevent, Collect
option2: Elimination of Violence to Protection of Rights
option3: Stop Violence against women and girls
answer: Orange the World: Fund, Respond, Prevent, Collect
explanation:
‘International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women’ is observed every year on November 25, led by the United Nations General Assembly.
This year, the theme for the International Day is “Orange the World: Fund, Respond, Prevent, Collect!”, to focus on bridging the funding gaps to serve the survivors of violence. UN observed that violence against women and girls has increased during the pandemic, terming it ‘Shadow Pandemic’.
